headline: Hasbro Leans On Harry Potter Deal And Toy Fair To Bridge Valuation Gap
summary: Hasbro (NasdaqGS:HAS) announced a multi-year licensing partnership with Warner Bros. for Harry Potter. The company showcased new toy products and technology at the North American International Toy Fair. Hasbro also introduced inclusivity focused toys and brand collaborations across several core franchises. For a company built around branded entertainment and play, Hasbro (NasdaqGS:HAS) is leaning further into well known worlds and fan communities. The new Harry Potter agreement with Warner...
